arts.ttl: Dieter Hecking: “We need to be more determined and consistent”
arts.sum: Bochum’s experienced coach shared his disappointment despite a solid performance against Europa League quarter-finalists.

arts.ttl: Dino Toppmöller: “We fought against a lot of adversity”
arts.sum: Eintracht Frankfurt’s coach is delighted for his team’s first Bundesliga win in five matches.

arts.ttl: Frankfurt prevail in Bochum thanks to record-breaking teenager
arts.sum: Jean-Mattéo Bahoya scored his first Bundesliga goal and set a new speed record in Frankfurt’s hard-fought win in Bochum.

arts.ttl: Eintracht Frankfurt return to winning ways with victory in Bochum
arts.sum: Rasmus Kristensen and Jean-Mattéo Bahoya struck first-half goals, with Michy Batshuayi adding a late third, for Eintracht Frankfurt to end a three-game winless run in the Bundesliga with a 3-1 victory at Bochum, for whom Gerrit Holtmann’s finish was a mere consolation in their battle to avoid relegation. Jean-Mattéo Bahoya got his first Bundesliga goal.

arts.ttl: Frankfurt prevail in Bochum thanks to record-breaker teenager
arts.sum: Jean-Mattéo Bahoya scored his first Bundesliga goal and set a new speed record in Frankfurt’s hard-fought win in Bochum.

arts.ttl: Dortmund rue missed chances as Leipzig move level with fourth-placed Frankfurt
arts.sum: Borussia Dortmund rued missed chances as clinical RB Leipzig won 2-0.

arts.ttl: Bochum vs. Eintracht Frankfurt preview: Can the visitors end losing league run?
arts.sum: Eintracht Frankfurt will look to end a run of three consecutive Bundesliga defeats when they travel to the Vonovia-Ruhrstadion for Sunday’s fixture.

arts.ttl: Preview: VfL Bochum vs. Eintracht Frankfurt - prediction, team news, lineups
arts.sum: Sports Mole previews Sunday's Bundesliga clash between VfL Bochum and Eintracht Frankfurt, including predictions, team news and possible lineups.
